feature.label: ElectroCodeoGram EclipseSensor with ECG Lab
feature.description: This feature provides a plugin that acts as a sensor inside Eclipse programming process events. The sensor plugin collects "micro-process" events like the opening of a file, the running or building of an application, or textual changes in documents. The events are sent to the ElectroCodeoGram's ECG Lab. The ECG Lab comes along with this feature and the sensor plugin is configured to initiate the communication with the ECG Lab on its own.
